content: शरावः --वं [शरं दध्यादिसारमवति अव-अण् <ls>Tv.</ls>] {@--1@} A shallow dish, platter, an earthenware vessel, tray; मोदकशरावं ग्टहीत्वा <ls>V. 3</ls>; <ls>Ms. 6. 56.</ls> {@--2@} A cover, lid. {@--3@} A measure equal to {2} {%Kuḍavas%}.
